page.title: 04Employment in Peter Tavy
page.content: Most people of working age in this area have jobs. There is only one bus to Tavistock once a week so people have to find their own transport to get to work.Most people work on the land,farming and forestry,but others have professions such as consultants, managers and accountants.Work provided in Peter Tavy is only at the Post Office/Shop and the other occupation around the village is lorry driving.So far we have found out that employment in this area is not satisfactory. People have to go to Tavistock, Plymouth and other towns for work.
